DOC.detailed_description: Patients 18-65 year American Society Anesthesiologists ' ( ASA ) Physical Status class I-II , schedule arthroscopic knee surgery , enrol randomise comparative clinical trial . Blinding mask begin preoperative hold unit . Exclusion criterion psychiatric illness , young 18 yo , analgesic treatment surgery know hypersensitivity relevant drug . All patient receive standard anaesthetic protocol ; ECG , heart rate , non-invasive blood pressure , oxygen saturation temperature monitor . After preoxygenation , general anaesthesia induce sodium pentothal 4 7 mg/kg , 1 mcg/kg fentanyl neuromuscular block achieve rocuronium 0.5 mg/kg trachea intubate . Anesthesia maintain desflurane 6 % 50 % oxygen medical air . Randomised patient achieve dexmedetomidine levobupivacaine levobupivacaine intra-articularly 10 minute medical tourniquet deaerate . Postoperative analgesia maintain morphine patient-controlled analgesia . Patients postoperative VAS value analgesic consumption record postoperative 24 hour .
